sentences.en: "Everybody missed her," Stan said with a hangdog look.
sentences.cn: “大家都想念她，”斯坦面带愧色地说。

sentences.en: And yet everybody has certain ideals which determine the direction of his endeavors and his judgments.
sentences.cn: 可是每个人都有一些理想，这些理想决定着他的努力和判断的方向。

sentences.en: As a second lieutenant, he had to salute damned near everybody.
sentences.cn: 身为少尉，他几乎是逢人便得敬礼。

sentences.en: Everybody knows Tom.
sentences.cn: 人人都认识汤姆。

sentences.en: Everybody says he is the very man for the case.
sentences.cn: 每个人都说他是接手这个案子的最佳人选。

sentences.en: Everybody thinks of him as the quintessential New Yorker.
sentences.cn: 大家都视他为典型的纽约人。

sentences.en: He delivered the line perfectly, and everybody roared with laughter.
sentences.cn: 那句台词他拿捏得恰到好处，引得众人哈哈大笑。

sentences.en: He's got that fiery temper which scares the whatsit out of everybody.
sentences.cn: 他有一副能把所有人都吓得那个什么滚什么流的火爆脾气。

sentences.en: However it is impossible for us to make friends with everybody.
sentences.cn: 然而对我们来说是不可能和每个人交朋友。

sentences.en: If we turned up late we would be hammered by everybody.
sentences.cn: 如果我们迟到，就会遭到大家的声讨。

sentences.en: It must be really depressing listening to everybody's whinges.
sentences.cn: 听每个人的抱怨肯定非常地郁闷。

sentences.en: It's impossible to get everybody together at the same time.
sentences.cn: 让所有人同时聚在一起是不可能的。

sentences.en: Oh, I can't explain it. It's just unreal. Everybody is so happy.
sentences.cn: 啊，我都没法形容。就是太棒了，每个人都很高兴。

sentences.en: She showed me round and introduced me to everybody.
sentences.cn: 她领着我四处看了看，将我介绍给每个人。

sentences.en: The minute that the war started, everybody was glued to the television.
sentences.cn: 战事一起，所有人都盯紧了电视报道。

sentences.en: The speaker was boring everybody.
sentences.cn: 说话者令每个人生厌。

sentences.en: They've really been kicking ass lately — busting places up, harassing everybody.
sentences.cn: 他们最近真是让人气不打一处来，闹得天翻地覆，搅得每个人都不得安宁。

sentences.en: We like everybody to say what they think.
sentences.cn: 我们喜欢让人人都说出他们的看法。

sentences.en: We put it on and everybody said "Oh it's a brilliant production".
sentences.cn: 我们把它搬上舞台，大家都说：“噢，真是一部了不起的作品。”

sentences.en: Yesterday was a day off for everybody, with the exception of Lawrence.
sentences.cn: 昨天所有人都放一天假，劳伦斯除外。
